children.subject:
Great question! Appcruit offers many advantages that you would not received when applying directly through a company's website.

First, when you apply through Appcruit, an Appcruit Talent Specialist reviews your resume before an employer see's it. This is great given Appcruit can catch any errors and chat with you about updates to your resume if necessary. We are all about making sure you put your best foot forward.

Second, applying through Appcruit ensures that your resume is reviewed and allows you to bypass thousands of applicants who apply through the normal application process. This makes a candidate who applies through Appcruit more likely to receive an interview.

Third, the access you get to employers is all virtual. Imagine hearing from employers about their companies or having a Q&A with companies virtually. This all ties together the product and reimagines the way employers recruit college talent.

I hope this answered your question.

Awesome thanks for your answer! I have already applied to a few positions. When should I hear back from a Appcruit talent specialist? I'm hoping to get my resume to the employers as soon as possible.

I already have some options for summer, however some open positions on appcruit really interests me.

Hey! 

I just signed up, and will be applying to a few of the positions. 

Just to clarify, does appcruit provide some sort of guidance after submitting the application? How does this differ from normal applications? 

Thanks.

history.content:
Hi Everyone!

I am currently working for Appcruit and we're recruiting Cal students in EECS, CS, and Data Science for summer internships.

Appcruit is a start-up re-inventing the way companies do diversity recruiting.  We connect underrepresented students with top companies for FREE. 


Sing up at  appcruit.com and get matched with an employer! USE REFERRAL CODE: "calbears" to receive priority.
history.subject: Summer Internship Opportunities

history.content:
Hi Everyone!

I am currently working for Appcruit and we're recruiting Cal students in EECS, CS, and Data Science for summer internships.

Appcruit is a start-up re-inventing the way companies do diversity recruiting.  We connect underrepresented students with top companies for FREE. 


Sing up at  appcruit.com and get matched with an employer! Click on Campus Ambassador in the application then use referral code: "calbears" to receive priority.
